languages.text: When Captain Walz's wounds fall below 50% he starts acting after every enemy.

traits.locale_text: When Captain Walz's wounds fall below 50% he starts acting after every enemy.

languages.text: Once Captain Walz's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, he acts after the end of each enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} капитана Вальца опускается ниже 50%, он начинает действовать после завершения {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} каждого противника.

traits.locale_text: Once Captain Walz's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, he acts after the end of each enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
Once Captain Walz's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, he acts after the end of each enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} капитана Вальца опускается ниже 50%, он начинает действовать после завершения {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} каждого противника.
Kaptan Walz'ın {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı %50'nin altına düştüğünde her düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonunda eyleme geçer.
languages.original_text: Once Captain Walz's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, he acts after the end of each enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Kaptan Walz'ın {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı %50'nin altına düştüğünde her düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonunda eyleme geçer.

languages.text: Cuando las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} del capitán Walz bajen del 50 %, actuará después del final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de cada enemigo.
languages.original_text: Once Captain Walz's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, he acts after the end of each enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} del capitán Walz bajen del 50 %, actuará después del final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de cada enemigo.

languages.text: 当沃尔茨队长的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降至50%以下后，他会在每个敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束后立刻开始行动。
languages.original_text: Once Captain Walz's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, he acts after the end of each enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当沃尔茨队长的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降至50%以下后，他会在每个敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束后立刻开始行动。

languages.text: Quand les {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} du capitaine Walz sont inférieures à 50 %, il agit après le {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de chaque ennemi.
languages.original_text: Once Captain Walz's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, he acts after the end of each enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Quand les {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} du capitaine Walz sont inférieures à 50 %, il agit après le {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de chaque ennemi.

languages.text: キャプテン・ワルツの{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が50%を下回ると、彼は敵の各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の終了後に行動する。
languages.original_text: Once Captain Walz's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, he acts after the end of each enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: キャプテン・ワルツの{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が50%を下回ると、彼は敵の各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の終了後に行動する。

languages.text: Sinken die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} von Captain Walz unter 50 %, agiert er nach jedem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} eines Gegners.
languages.original_text: Once Captain Walz's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, he acts after the end of each enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Sinken die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} von Captain Walz unter 50 %, agiert er nach jedem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} eines Gegners.
